data.claim: Rule of Thirds & Golden Ratio: Rule of thirds = 3x3 grid, 4 intersection "sweet spots" for focal points. Top-left gets 40%+ attention, bottom-right minimal. Golden Ratio = 1:1.618 proportion found in nature. Rule of thirds is simpler/more flexible for responsive. Both create asymmetry which is more dynamic than symmetry. Place CTAs and key elements on sweet spots. Combine both: place focal points where golden ratio intersects rule-of-thirds gridlines.
